data.name: Open-MIC 2018
data.desc: Audio and partial instrument annotations for 20,000 10-second clips

data.name: MSD Challenge
data.desc: Large-scale music recommendation on the Million Song Dataset. See also the year 1 test set.

data.name: AotM-2011
data.desc: Annotated playlists from Art of the Mix, indexed to the Million Song Dataset.

data.name: AotM-2003
data.desc: An earlier collection of playlists from Art of the Mix, also indexed to the Million Song Dataset.

data.name: aset400 kernels
data.desc: Kernel matrices for aset400 artist similarity experiments

data.name: eHarmony
data.desc: Matchings and anonymized features for several hundred thousand eHarmony users.
